title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 177.18 - Chairperson of the independent review board
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 177.18 - Chairperson of the independent review board

State Regulations

The director of the division shall appoint one of the members
of the Independent Review Board to serve as its chairperson. The member so
appointed shall serve as chairperson for a renewable term of one year. The
chairperson of the board shall: (a) be
responsible for coordinating the activities of the board, with the assistance
of the ombudsman director; (b) preside at meetings of the board; (c) recommend to the director of the division
agenda items for board meetings; and
(d) make recommendations to the director of
the division for the removal of inactive board members. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
